item.title: Teleport code after wild
item.dc:creator: @aceeca aceeca
item.description:
@aceeca wrote:

How do I make it so when a tele code is typed say ::varrock it checks to see if your in the wild and if you are it wonâ€™t let you teleport. But can you make it so if you player rights are 2 or above it allows you?

My wild cords

absY >= 2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112

here is the boolean if you want it

public boolean nonWild() { if (absY >= 2752 && absY <= 3520 && absX <= 3838 && absX >= 2112) return true; else return false; }
